org.red5.io.mp4.impl

Class MP4

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.io.mp4.impl.MP4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStreamableFile, IMP4

    public class MP4
extends Object
implements IMP4
    A MP4Impl implements the MP4 api
    Author:
    The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Paul Gregoire, (mondain@gmail.com)
